name: Beach Adventure Heroes - Crush gummy candy to save the Hawaiian Tropics!
name_original: Beach Adventure Heroes - Crush gummy candy to save the Hawaiian Tropics!
description:
Help the Beach Adventure Heroes mix and match gummy fruit candies!

"You owe it to yourself to try this fun and addicting game." - www.appreviews.com

▶ MUCH easier than other matching games!
▶ Unlock powerful items for FREE!
▶ Over 500+ levels - with more added each week!
▶ HD graphics and explosive effects!
▶ Challenge friends and other players through Game Center!

Download for FREE! *Limited time only*


●●●Now available on iPhone and iPad!!●●●
